name: Quarantine Mage
description:
Do you love arcade games? Then you should play Quarantine Mage!

With a simple graphics and beginner friendly gameplay, all people from all age can play this game.

This game require 2 players that challenged to fight each other. Make sure you are a player that love competition. Try to play with your friends or family, and prove your strenght to them!

Song Credit:
"Fury Road" By HeatleyBros:
https://youtu.be/4aF6Tzna1V0
